greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Column 0 of the matrix logarithm (A111815) of triangle A078122, which shifts columns left and up under matrix cube; these terms are the result of multiplying the element in row n by n!.
comment: Let q=3; the g.f. of column k of A078122^m (matrix power m) is: 1 + Sum_{n>=1} (m*q^k)^n/n! * Product_{j=0..n-1} A(q^j*x).
formula: E.g.f. satisfies: x/(1-x) = Sum_{n>=1} Prod_{j=0..n-1} A(3^j*x)/(j+1).
example: Let G(x) be the g.f. of A078124 (column 1 of A078122), then
results.author: _Gottfried Helms_ and _Paul D. Hanna_, Aug 22 2005
